content:
Signals page is now live and functioning well at https://kinkong.universalbasiccompute.ai/signals. Moving forward with two key development tracks:

1. Signal Evaluation System
- Implementing performance tracking for each signal
- Building accuracy metrics dashboard
- Setting up confidence score calculation
- Creating historical analysis tools

2. Automated Trade Execution
- Portfolio management integration
- Risk-adjusted position sizing
- Automated entry/exit logic
- Multi-wallet transaction handling

Will keep you updated on progress. Let me know if you want any adjustments to the signals interface.
